tr_quotes.quote: Tüm düşüncenizi elinizdeki işe yoğunlaştırın. Güneşin ışınları odaklanmadan yakmaz.
tr_quotes.author: Alexander Graham Bell

tr_quotes.quote: Devler gibi eserler bırakmak için, karıncalar gibi çalışmak gerekir.
tr_quotes.author: Necip Fazıl Kısakürek

tr_quotes.quote: Çalışmak, her şeyi fetheder.
tr_quotes.author: Virgilius

tr_quotes.quote: Çalışmak hayat, düşünmek ışıktır.
tr_quotes.author: Victor Hugo

tr_quotes.quote: Çalışmak, en soylu iştir.
tr_quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

tr_quotes.quote: Çalışmak, en hayırlı sermayedir.
tr_quotes.author: Hz. Ömer

tr_quotes.quote: Çalışmadaki devamlılık, her güçlüğü yener.
tr_quotes.author: Anthony Trollope

tr_quotes.quote: Yavaş ve sabırla çalışma, güzel işler üretir.
tr_quotes.author: Çin Atasözü

tr_quotes.quote: Çalışırken, en çirkin insan bile güzeldir.
tr_quotes.author: Hz. Muhammed

tr_quotes.quote: Ne kadar çok çalışırsan, o kadar mesut olursun.
tr_quotes.author: Charles Dickens

tr_quotes.quote: Başarı yalnız sözlüklerde çalışmadan önce gelir.
tr_quotes.author: Rod Whitaker

tr_quotes.quote: Çalışmak; sıkıntıyı, kötülüğü ve yoksulluğu uzaklaştırır.
tr_quotes.author: Andre Maurois

tr_quotes.quote: Ölümsüzlük, bitmeyen sonsuz bir işte çalışmaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Ernest Renan

tr_quotes.quote: Çalışmak istemeyenler için, Tanrı hiçbir yerde yardımcı olamaz.
tr_quotes.author: Sophokles

tr_quotes.quote: Bilginin efendisi olmak için çalışmanın uşağı, olmak şarttır.
tr_quotes.author: Balzac

tr_quotes.quote: Çalışarak ün kazananların sayısı, doğuştan ünlü olanlardan daha fazladır.
tr_quotes.author: Cicero

tr_quotes.quote: Başarının formülü petrol, grev, çok çalışmak, erken kalkmak.
tr_quotes.author: Jean Paul Getty

tr_quotes.quote: Hiç kimse, kendi el emeğinden daha hayırlı bir şey yememiştir.
tr_quotes.author: Hz. Muhammed

tr_quotes.quote: Bir metre iş yapmayı, bir kilometre söz vermeye değişmem.
tr_quotes.author: James Hovvell

tr_quotes.quote: Çalışacağım, kendimi hazırlayacağım ve bir gün şans kapımı çalacak.
tr_quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

tr_quotes.quote: En büyük makam, en büyük hak, çalışanlara ait olacaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Atatürk

tr_quotes.quote: Çalışmak, her şeyi fetheder.
tr_quotes.author: Virgilius

tr_quotes.quote: Çalışmak, en soylu iştir.
tr_quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

tr_quotes.quote: Çalışmak, en hayırlı sermayedir.
tr_quotes.author: Hz. Ömer

tr_quotes.quote: Çalışmak, çalışmak, çalışmak…
tr_quotes.author: Sakıp Sabancı

tr_quotes.quote: Çalışmak hayat, düşünmek ışıktır.
tr_quotes.author: Victor Hugo

tr_quotes.quote: Yavaş ve sabırla çalışma, güzel işler üretir.
tr_quotes.author: Çin Atasözü

tr_quotes.quote: Gelecek bugün ne kadar çalıştığınıza bağlı.
tr_quotes.author: Mahatma Gandi

tr_quotes.quote: Çalışmadaki devamlılık, her güçlüğü yener.
tr_quotes.author: Anthony Trollope

tr_quotes.quote: Ölümsüzlük, bitmeyen sonsuz bir işte çalışmaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Ernest Renan

tr_quotes.quote: Ne kadar çok çalışırsam o kadar şanslı oluyorum.
tr_quotes.author: Gary Player

tr_quotes.quote: Ne kadar çok çalışırsan, o kadar mutlu olursun.
tr_quotes.author: Charles Dickens

tr_quotes.quote: Birinci olamayacağınızı bilseniz de birinci olacakmış gibi çalışın.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Bilginin efendisi olmak için çalışmanın uşağı, olmak şarttır.
tr_quotes.author: Balzac

tr_quotes.quote: Dehanın 10’da 1’i yetenek, 10’da 9’u da çalışmaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

tr_quotes.quote: Çalışmak; sıkıntıyı, kötülüğü ve yoksulluğu uzaklaştırır.
tr_quotes.author: Andre Maurois

tr_quotes.quote: Her insan çalışmayı sevmez, işte bu yüzden başarı da her insana yakışmaz.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Seveceğin bir iş seçersen, yaşamında bir gün bile çalışmış olmazsın.
tr_quotes.author: Konfüçyüs

tr_quotes.quote: Çalışarak ün kazananların sayısı, doğuştan ünlü olanlardan daha fazladır.
tr_quotes.author: Cicero

tr_quotes.quote: Yoksulun tek silahı çalışmaktır. Tembellerin ise çalışma günü yarındır.
tr_quotes.author: Aziz Nesin

tr_quotes.quote: Çalışacağım, kendimi hazırlayacağım ve bir gün şans kapımı çalacak.
tr_quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

tr_quotes.quote: Yapabileceğini düşündüğünden, daha fazlasını yapamayacak hiç kimse yoktur.
tr_quotes.author: Henry Ford

tr_quotes.quote: Evler gibi eserler bırakmak için, karıncalar gibi çalışmak gerekir.
tr_quotes.author: Necip Fazıl Kısakürek

tr_quotes.quote: Şansın varlığına yürekten inanan biriyim ve ne denli çok çalışırsam o denli çok rastlarım ona.
tr_quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

tr_quotes.quote: Şansa çok inanırım ve daha sıkı çalıştığımda daha şanslı olduğumu görürüm.
tr_quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

tr_quotes.quote: Çalışmak bizi şu üç beladan kurtarır: Can sıkıntısı, kötü alışkanlıklar ve yoksulluk.
tr_quotes.author: Voltaire

tr_quotes.quote: Hayatın bizlere sunduğu en iyi ödül, buna değecek bir işte çalışma şansıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

tr_quotes.quote: Daha iyi olmak için çaba gösterdiğimizde, etrafımızdaki her şey daha da iyi oluyor.
tr_quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

tr_quotes.quote: Çalışmak hayatın en önemli sarayıdır, insanlık mutluluğa ancak bununla ulaşabilecektir.
tr_quotes.author: Lev Tolstoy

tr_quotes.quote: Çalışmak, çalışmak ve daha çok çalışmak! Ancak o sayede hedefinize ulaşabilirsiniz.
tr_quotes.author: Vladimir Bartol

tr_quotes.quote: Hiçbir başarımı tesadüfe borçlu değilim, buluşlarım da tesadüfün değil çalışmalarımın eseridir.
tr_quotes.author: Thomas Edison

tr_quotes.quote: Hiçbir şeye muhtaç değiliz, yalnız tek bir şeye çok ihtiyacımız vardır: Çalışkan olmak.
tr_quotes.author: Atatürk

tr_quotes.quote: Şansın varlığına yürekten inanan biriyim ve ne denli çok çalışırsam o denli çok rastlarım ona.
tr_quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

tr_quotes.quote: Asla pes etmeyin. Başlangıçlar her zaman en zorudur. Ancak hayat her zaman çok çalışanları ödüllendirir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: İş hayatında başarı; eğitim, disiplin ve çok çalışma gerektirir. Ancak bunlardan korkmazsanız, fırsatlar hiç olmadıkları kadar iyi olurlar.
tr_quotes.author: David Rockefeller

en_quotes.quote: I think goals should never be easy, they should force you to work, even if they are uncomfortable at the time
en_quotes.author: Michael Phelps

en_quotes.quote: There is no substitute for hard work. Never give up. Never stop believing. Never stop fighting
en_quotes.author: Hope Hicks

en_quotes.quote: Through hard work, perseverance and a faith in God, you can live your dreams
en_quotes.author: Ben Carson

en_quotes.quote: Follow your passion, be prepared to work hard and sacrifice, and, above all, don't let anyone limit your dreams
en_quotes.author: Donovan Bailey

en_quotes.quote: You can control two things: your work ethic and your attitude about anything
en_quotes.author: Ali Krieger

en_quotes.quote: There is no higher religion than human service. To work for the common good is the greatest creed
en_quotes.author: Woodrow Wilson

en_quotes.quote: With hard work and effort, you can achieve anything
en_quotes.author: Antoine Griezmann

en_quotes.quote: Do your work with your whole heart, and you will succeed - there's so little competition
en_quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

en_quotes.quote: The three great essentials to achieve anything worth while are: Hard work, Stick-to-itiveness, and Common sense
en_quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

en_quotes.quote: With hard work and dedication, anything is possible
en_quotes.author: Timothy Weah

en_quotes.quote: Success is the result of perfection, hard work, learning from failure, loyalty, and persistence
en_quotes.author: Colin Powell

en_quotes.quote: Without labor nothing prospers
en_quotes.author: Sophocles

en_quotes.quote: In fitness, there are no short cuts. It involves immense discipline and hard work
en_quotes.author: Mahesh Babu

en_quotes.quote: Hard work pays off - hard work beats talent any day, but if you're talented and work hard, it's hard to be beat
en_quotes.author: Robert Griffin III

en_quotes.quote: Rest when you're weary. Refresh and renew yourself, your body, your mind, your spirit. Then get back to work
en_quotes.author: Ralph Marston

en_quotes.quote: Destiny plays an important part, but talent and hard work is also important
en_quotes.author: Kriti Sanon

en_quotes.quote: I can only control myself, my actions, my work ethic, and my attitude
en_quotes.author: Ali Krieger

en_quotes.quote: Our environment, the world in which we live and work, is a mirror of our attitudes and expectations
en_quotes.author: Earl Nightingale

en_quotes.quote: Keep doing some kind of work, that the devil may always find you employed
en_quotes.author: St. Jerome

en_quotes.quote: Work hard. Through determination and self-focus and discipline, you can accomplish anything
en_quotes.author: Kimberly Guilfoyle

en_quotes.quote: A lot of hard work is hidden behind nice things
en_quotes.author: Ralph Lauren

en_quotes.quote: We are all born ignorant, but one must work hard to remain stupid
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

en_quotes.quote: Perseverance is the hard work you do after you get tired of doing the hard work you already did
en_quotes.author: Newt Gingrich

en_quotes.quote: Without hard work, nothing grows but weeds
en_quotes.author: Gordon B. Hinckley

en_quotes.quote: You can never go wrong when you have a great team to work with
en_quotes.author: Kubra Sait

en_quotes.quote: Self-belief and hard work will always earn you success
en_quotes.author: Virat Kohli

en_quotes.quote: Four things for success: work and pray, think and believe
en_quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

en_quotes.quote: Teamwork makes the dream work, but a vision becomes a nightmare when the leader has a big dream and a bad team
en_quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

en_quotes.quote: Work as though you would live forever, and live as though you would die today. Go another mile!
en_quotes.author: Og Mandino

en_quotes.quote: The older you get, the better you have to look, the higher you have to kick, the harder you have to work
en_quotes.author: Salman Khan

en_quotes.quote: It is easy to make promises - it is hard work to keep them
en_quotes.author: Boris Johnson

en_quotes.quote: Some of our finest work comes through service to others
en_quotes.author: Gordon B. Hinckley

en_quotes.quote: Pray as though everything depended on God. Work as though everything depended on you
en_quotes.author: Saint Augustine

en_quotes.quote: Enjoy your sweat because hard work doesn't guarantee success, but without it you don't have a chance
en_quotes.author: Alex Rodriguez

en_quotes.quote: Creativity is a habit, and the best creativity is the result of good work habits
en_quotes.author: Twyla Tharp

en_quotes.quote: New knowledge is the most valuable commodity on earth. The more truth we have to work with, the richer we become
en_quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

en_quotes.quote: The power of one, if fearless and focused, is formidable, but the power of many working together is better
en_quotes.author: Gloria Macapagal Arroyo

en_quotes.quote: Pleasure in the job puts perfection in the work
en_quotes.author: Aristotle

en_quotes.quote: Never lose the childlike wonder. Show gratitude... Don't complain; just work harder... Never give up
en_quotes.author: Randy Pausch

en_quotes.quote: For every two minutes of glamour, there are eight hours of hard work
en_quotes.author: Jessica Savitch

en_quotes.quote: This has always been a motto of mine: Attempt the impossible in order to improve your work
en_quotes.author: Bette Davis

en_quotes.quote: Great companies are built in the office, with hard work put in by a team
en_quotes.author: Emily Chang

en_quotes.quote: The true work of art is but a shadow of the divine perfection
en_quotes.author: Michelangelo

en_quotes.quote: When you go all over the world for work, your dream vacation is your bedroom
en_quotes.author: Jack Antonoff

en_quotes.quote: If you have a dream, it's definitely achievable through hard work, through dedication, sacrifice, everything
en_quotes.author: Carli Lloyd

en_quotes.quote: I know my strong points: I work hard, I have talent, I'm funny, and I'm a good person
en_quotes.author: Pink

en_quotes.quote: Be different, stand out, and work your butt off
en_quotes.author: Reba McEntire

en_quotes.quote: I believe in stopping work and eating lunch
en_quotes.author: L'Wren Scott

en_quotes.quote: Football is about sacrifice, dedication, a lot of work, and friendship off the pitch
en_quotes.author: Edinson Cavani

en_quotes.quote: Surround yourself with people who take their work seriously, but not themselves, those who work hard and play hard
en_quotes.author: Colin Powell

en_quotes.quote: You see, God helps only people who work hard. That principle is very clear
en_quotes.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

en_quotes.quote: I feel like a tiger right now. There's nothing impossible if you get up and work for it
en_quotes.author: Michael Flatley

en_quotes.quote: Education and work are the levers to uplift a people
en_quotes.author: W. E. B. Du Bois

en_quotes.quote: There is a saying that every nice piece of work needs the right person in the right place at the right time
en_quotes.author: Benoit Mandelbrot

en_quotes.quote: The beginning is the most important part of the work
en_quotes.author: Plato

en_quotes.quote: We are infected by our own misunderstanding of how our own minds work
en_quotes.author: Kevin Kelly

en_quotes.quote: Work hard, stay positive, and get up early. It's the best part of the day
en_quotes.author: George Allen, Sr.

en_quotes.quote: In the city, we work until quitting time. On the farm, we work until the job is finished
en_quotes.author: John Bytheway

en_quotes.quote: A work of art is a world in itself reflecting senses and emotions of the artist's world
en_quotes.author: Hans Hofmann

en_quotes.quote: The main thing to do is relax and let your talent do the work
en_quotes.author: Charles Barkley

en_quotes.quote: Hard work always wins in the end
en_quotes.author: Lucas Till

en_quotes.quote: Let us realize that: the privilege to work is a gift, the power to work is a blessing, the love of work is success!
en_quotes.author: David O. McKay

en_quotes.quote: The secret of joy in work is contained in one word - excellence. To know how to do something well is to enjoy it
en_quotes.author: Pearl S. Buck

en_quotes.quote: It has been a long journey, but if you dream and have the ambition and want to work hard, then you can achieve
en_quotes.author: Mo Farah

en_quotes.quote: The only thing that overcomes hard luck is hard work
en_quotes.author: Harry Golden

en_quotes.quote: I'll always use the negativity as more motivation to work even harder and become even stronger
en_quotes.author: Tim Tebow

en_quotes.quote: All wealth is the product of labor
en_quotes.author: John Locke

en_quotes.quote: Thunder is good, thunder is impressive; but it is lightning that does the work
en_quotes.author: Mark Twain

en_quotes.quote: If you want to become a great chef, you have to work with great chefs. And that's exactly what I did
en_quotes.author: Gordon Ramsay

en_quotes.quote: If you watch a game, it's fun. If you play it, it's recreation. If you work at it, it's golf
en_quotes.author: Bob Hope

en_quotes.quote: Work, apart from devotion or love of God, is helpless and cannot stand alone
en_quotes.author: Ramakrishna

en_quotes.quote: I feel lucky that I got to work with some of the big legends in town
en_quotes.author: Yvonne Strahovski

en_quotes.quote: I believe that anyone can be what they want to be; it just comes down to hard work
en_quotes.author: Kiesza

en_quotes.quote: The reward for work well done is the opportunity to do more
en_quotes.author: Jonas Salk

en_quotes.quote: Doing stunt work is risky, but it's something I enjoy
en_quotes.author: Verne Troyer

en_quotes.quote: Good leadership consists of showing average people how to do the work of superior people
en_quotes.author: John D. Rockefeller

en_quotes.quote: It's a lot easier to do good work when you have good words to say and work with good people
en_quotes.author: Mark Harmon

en_quotes.quote: A beautiful lady is an accident of nature. A beautiful old lady is a work of art
en_quotes.author: Louis Nizer

en_quotes.quote: Decide what you want, decide what you are willing to exchange for it. Establish your priorities and go to work
en_quotes.author: H. L. Hunt

en_quotes.quote: Every training session, I work hard to improve my weaknesses and build on my strengths
en_quotes.author: Antoine Griezmann

en_quotes.quote: Derive happiness in oneself from a good day's work, from illuminating the fog that surrounds us
en_quotes.author: Henri Matisse

en_quotes.quote: Wherever smart people work, doors are unlocked
en_quotes.author: Steve Wozniak

en_quotes.quote: Be glad of life because it gives you the chance to love, to work, to play, and to look up at the stars
en_quotes.author: Henry Van Dyke

en_quotes.quote: I don't have any formula. I just work with my heart, putting in a lot of hard work
en_quotes.author: Ranbir Kapoor

en_quotes.quote: Good management consists in showing average people how to do the work of superior people
en_quotes.author: John D. Rockefeller

en_quotes.quote: I try to work and enjoy life, and that's about all
en_quotes.author: Curtis Armstrong

en_quotes.quote: I work extremely hard to stay positive and happy. But I get sad and anxious, too, just like everyone
en_quotes.author: Rachel Platten

en_quotes.quote: It's true: teamwork makes the dream work
en_quotes.author: Natalya Neidhart

en_quotes.quote: The fruit of your own hard work is the sweetest
en_quotes.author: Deepika Padukone

en_quotes.quote: You have to fight to reach your dream. You have to sacrifice and work hard for it
en_quotes.author: Lionel Messi

en_quotes.quote: For me, real life is hard work. Making movies is like a vacation for my soul
en_quotes.author: Guillermo del Toro

en_quotes.quote: God Bless my mother and father for all the hard work they've done for our family
en_quotes.author: Coy Bowles

en_quotes.quote: I believe there are two periods in life, one for the bike, the other for becoming active on one's work
en_quotes.author: Bernard Hinault

en_quotes.quote: Your most important work is always ahead of you, never behind you
en_quotes.author: Stephen Covey

en_quotes.quote: Work hard, be kind, and amazing things will happen
en_quotes.author: Conan O'Brien

en_quotes.quote: It's really nice to know that hard work does pay off
en_quotes.author: Rose Namajunas

en_quotes.quote: Concentrate all your thoughts upon the work at hand. The sun's rays do not burn until brought to a focus
en_quotes.author: Alexander Graham Bell

en_quotes.quote: I enjoy the work, I enjoy every minute of my professional life
en_quotes.author: Jose Mourinho

en_quotes.quote: Thinking is the hardest work there is, which is probably the reason why so few engage in it
en_quotes.author: Henry Ford

en_quotes.quote: I'm not a hopeless romantic. I'm quite the reverse. I'm a nasty piece of work, an ego maniac
en_quotes.author: Hugh Grant

en_quotes.quote: The only recipe is hard work, persistence, and belief
en_quotes.author: Julen Lopetegui

en_quotes.quote: If you work hard and you work for somebody who empowers you and challenges you, you'll be successful
en_quotes.author: Hope Hicks

en_quotes.quote: I am very hands on doing my own work, all my own stunt work
en_quotes.author: Jodi Lyn O'Keefe

en_quotes.quote: If you work hard, nothing is impossible
en_quotes.author: Prabhu Deva

en_quotes.quote: Baseball is about talent, hard work, and strategy. But at the deepest level, it's about love, integrity, and respect
en_quotes.author: Pat Gillick

en_quotes.quote: Colleagues are a wonderful thing - but mentors, that's where the real work gets done
en_quotes.author: Junot Diaz

en_quotes.quote: The highest reward that God gives us for good work is the ability to do better work
en_quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

en_quotes.quote: It's important for a woman to feel good in her clothes. It's OK to have curves and to work them
en_quotes.author: Nicole Scherzinger

en_quotes.quote: Effective networking isn't a result of luck - it requires hard work and persistence
en_quotes.author: Lewis Howes

en_quotes.quote: Stay humble, be fearless, and work, work, work, work, work, work
en_quotes.author: Daya

en_quotes.quote: I love going to work out now. It gets out aggression and my trainer really shakes it up so I don't get bored
en_quotes.author: Adriana Lima

en_quotes.quote: When you see validation for a life's work and dedication, it's a beautiful day
en_quotes.author: Mary Gauthier

en_quotes.quote: Teamwork is the best kind of work, really
en_quotes.author: Sigrid

en_quotes.quote: Nothing ever comes to one, that is worth having, except as a result of hard work
en_quotes.author: Booker T. Washington

en_quotes.quote: And where I excel is ridiculous, sickening, work ethic. You know, while the other guy's sleeping? I'm working
en_quotes.author: Will Smith

en_quotes.quote: When a man tells you that he got rich through hard work, ask him: 'Whose?'
en_quotes.author: Don Marquis

en_quotes.quote: Passion is needed for any great work, and for the revolution, passion and audacity are required in big doses
en_quotes.author: Che Guevara

en_quotes.quote: Work out your own salvation. Do not depend on others
en_quotes.author: Buddha

en_quotes.quote: A gentle word, a kind look, a good-natured smile can work wonders and accomplish miracles
en_quotes.author: William Hazlitt

en_quotes.quote: Don't worry about being a star, worry about doing good work, and all that will come to you
en_quotes.author: Ice Cube

en_quotes.quote: Simplicity and repose are the qualities that measure the true value of any work of art
en_quotes.author: Frank Lloyd Wright

en_quotes.quote: One of the gifts of 'Star Trek' is my professional work colleagues have become my lifelong friends
en_quotes.author: George Takei

en_quotes.quote: What you are will show in what you do
en_quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

en_quotes.quote: A positive attitude is something everyone can work on, and everyone can learn how to employ it
en_quotes.author: Joan Lunden

en_quotes.quote: Laziness in my biggest pet peeve of all time. Get up, make a plan, do the work, and love yourself, people!
en_quotes.author: Dove Cameron

en_quotes.quote: It isn't enough to talk about peace. One must believe in it. And it isn't enough to believe in it. One must work at it
en_quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

en_quotes.quote: I guess we all like to be recognized not for one piece of fireworks, but for the ledger of our daily work
en_quotes.author: Neil Armstrong

en_quotes.quote: When you fail you learn from the mistakes you made and it motivates you to work even harder
en_quotes.author: Natalie Gulbis

en_quotes.quote: Quality is everyone's responsibility
en_quotes.author: W. Edwards Deming

en_quotes.quote: Hard work and dedication is important to success, and I have those qualities
en_quotes.author: Nargis Fakhri

en_quotes.quote: I put my heart and my soul into my work, and have lost my mind in the process
en_quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

en_quotes.quote: Most people work just hard enough not to get fired and get paid just enough money not to quit
en_quotes.author: George Carlin

en_quotes.quote: Patience can't be acquired overnight. It is just like building up a muscle. Every day you need to work on it
en_quotes.author: Eknath Easwaran

en_quotes.quote: Keep up the good work, if only for a while, if only for the twinkling of a tiny galaxy
en_quotes.author: Wislawa Szymborska

en_quotes.quote: Modeling is really what I do during my free time. It's fun for me, so it doesn't feel like work. I choose to do it
en_quotes.author: Kaia Gerber

en_quotes.quote: Disneyland is a work of love. We didn't go into Disneyland just with the idea of making money
en_quotes.author: Walt Disney

en_quotes.quote: Journalism is what we need to make democracy work
en_quotes.author: Walter Cronkite

en_quotes.quote: Our fatigue is often caused not by work, but by worry, frustration and resentment
en_quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

en_quotes.quote: Assets put money in your pocket, whether you work or not, and liabilities take money from your pocket
en_quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

en_quotes.quote: To work hard, to live hard, to die hard, and then go to hell after all would be too damn hard
en_quotes.author: Carl Sandburg

en_quotes.quote: Those who cannot work with their hearts achieve but a hollow, half-hearted success that breeds bitterness all around
en_quotes.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

en_quotes.quote: Luck is great, but most of life is hard work
en_quotes.author: Iain Duncan Smith

en_quotes.quote: If you do what you love, you're going work your butt off every day
en_quotes.author: Johny Hendricks

en_quotes.quote: I have very high standards for every part of life - my work, my relationships, food, love. I can't just pretend
en_quotes.author: Olivia Wilde

en_quotes.quote: I totally love to act. I don't care if it's a musical, a comedy. I just like to work and interact with other people
en_quotes.author: Reba McEntire

en_quotes.quote: Just because something didn't work out your way, or somebody disappointed you, that does not change who you are
en_quotes.author: Joel Osteen

en_quotes.quote: It's important to work hard, stay humble, and not let the criticism or the compliments go to your head
en_quotes.author: Jessica Sanchez

en_quotes.quote: Organizing is what you do before you do something, so that when you do it, it is not all mixed up
en_quotes.author: A. A. Milne

en_quotes.quote: I'm thankful because all the hard work and sacrifices were worth it in the end
en_quotes.author: WizKid

en_quotes.quote: Work like you don't need the money. Love like you've never been hurt. Dance like nobody's watching
en_quotes.author: Satchel Paige

en_quotes.quote: You will have ups and downs - but believe anything is possible. With hard work, it can come off
en_quotes.author: Geraint Thomas

en_quotes.quote: Keep the circus going inside you, keep it going, don't take anything too seriously, it'll all work out in the end
en_quotes.author: David Niven

en_quotes.quote: I believe when you meet the right person it clicks, and you both know and you start making it work, you know?
en_quotes.author: Hunter Hayes

en_quotes.quote: Find your passion, set a goal, go to work, evaluate, reassess, and repeat
en_quotes.author: Elana Meyers

en_quotes.quote: Persistence and resilience only come from having been given the chance to work though difficult problems
en_quotes.author: Gever Tulley

en_quotes.quote: I've always believed that if you put in the work, the results will come
en_quotes.author: Michael Jordan

en_quotes.quote: You can have fun, but when it is time to work, work hard and be focused
en_quotes.author: Emily Alyn Lind

en_quotes.quote: I give thanks everyday that I've been able to take my craziness and make it work for me
en_quotes.author: Fritz Scholder

en_quotes.quote: A beautiful body perishes, but a work of art dies not
en_quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

en_quotes.quote: By working faithfully eight hours a day you may eventually get to be boss and work twelve hours a day
en_quotes.author: Robert Frost

en_quotes.quote: Our work is the presentation of our capabilities
en_quotes.author: Edward Gibbon

en_quotes.quote: A good idea is about ten percent and implementation and hard work, and luck is 90 percent
en_quotes.author: Guy Kawasaki

en_quotes.quote: It is better to imitate ancient than modern work
en_quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

en_quotes.quote: By the work one knows the workman
en_quotes.author: Jean de La Fontaine

en_quotes.quote: I think our family motto is to always work hard, be humble, kind, and thoughtful about others around us
en_quotes.author: Anwar Hadid

en_quotes.quote: A work of art that contains theories is like an object on which the price tag has been left
en_quotes.author: Alexander Pope

en_quotes.quote: I used to work in a fire hydrant factory. You couldn't park anywhere near the place
en_quotes.author: Steven Wright

en_quotes.quote: The miracle is not that we do this work, but that we are happy to do it
en_quotes.author: Mother Teresa

en_quotes.quote: Plans are only good intentions unless they immediately degenerate into hard work
en_quotes.author: Peter Drucker

en_quotes.quote: All labor that uplifts humanity has dignity and importance and should be undertaken with painstaking excellence
en_quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

en_quotes.quote: Once you have commitment, you need the discipline and hard work to get you there
en_quotes.author: Haile Gebrselassie

en_quotes.quote: It's not an experiment if you know it's going to work
en_quotes.author: Jeff Bezos

en_quotes.quote: I try to not work too many Sundays. At least on Sunday nights, I try to chill out a little bit. I call it Sunday Funday
en_quotes.author: Miley Cyrus

en_quotes.quote: Without hard work and discipline it is difficult to be a top professional
en_quotes.author: Jahangir Khan

en_quotes.quote: The time I spent on the bench helped me to reflect and think. It encouraged me to keep fighting and work
en_quotes.author: David de Gea

en_quotes.quote: Luck is a dividend of sweat. The more you sweat, the luckier you get
en_quotes.author: Ray Kroc

en_quotes.quote: We can build a much brighter future where humans are relieved of menial work using AI capabilities
en_quotes.author: Andrew Ng

en_quotes.quote: Human rights must work to uplift human dignity
en_quotes.author: Rodrigo Duterte

en_quotes.quote: Begin - to begin is half the work, let half still remain; again begin this, and thou wilt have finished
en_quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

en_quotes.quote: People who work together will win, whether it be against complex football defenses, or the problems of modern society
en_quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

en_quotes.quote: I love to work out under a clear sky with lots of fresh air purifying my lungs
en_quotes.author: Nushrat Bharucha

en_quotes.quote: So much of what we call management consists in making it difficult for people to work
en_quotes.author: Peter Drucker

en_quotes.quote: I have to make sure I stay focused and have the same ambition I've always had and work hard - that's the key to success
en_quotes.author: Romelu Lukaku

en_quotes.quote: To continue to work, to continue to love what you do, is certainly a contributing element to one's longevity and health
en_quotes.author: John Williams

en_quotes.quote: The least of the work of learning is done in the classroom
en_quotes.author: Thomas Merton

en_quotes.quote: It's a great feeling when your work is appreciated
en_quotes.author: Jacqueline Fernandez

en_quotes.quote: When the mind, body, and spirit work together, I believe anything is possible
en_quotes.author: Criss Angel

en_quotes.quote: No person who is enthusiastic about his work has anything to fear from life
en_quotes.author: Samuel Goldwyn

en_quotes.quote: Work is the meat of life, pleasure the dessert
en_quotes.author: B. C. Forbes

en_quotes.quote: Don't work for recognition, but do work worthy of recognition
en_quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

en_quotes.quote: Live like you'll die tomorrow, work like you don't need the money, and dance like nobody's watching
en_quotes.author: Bob Fosse

en_quotes.quote: I think it all comes down to motivation. If you really want to do something, you will work hard for it
en_quotes.author: Edmund Hillary

en_quotes.quote: If you work for it, you'll deserve what comes. Hard work
en_quotes.author: DeMar DeRozan

en_quotes.quote: Choose a job you love, and you will never have to work a day in your life
en_quotes.author: Unknown

en_quotes.quote: I am happy with the way things are turning out for me because it is only my hard work and no one else's push
en_quotes.author: Ali Fazal

en_quotes.quote: Quality is pride of workmanship
en_quotes.author: W. Edwards Deming

en_quotes.quote: Wishing to be friends is quick work, but friendship is a slow ripening fruit
en_quotes.author: Aristotle

en_quotes.quote: When you form a team, why do you try to form a team? Because teamwork builds trust and trust builds speed
en_quotes.author: Russel Honore

en_quotes.quote: What matters is that you do great work, and you will definitely be remembered for that for years to come
en_quotes.author: Armaan Malik

en_quotes.quote: It is the working man who is the happy man. It is the idle man who is the miserable man
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

en_quotes.quote: Having a second chance makes you want to work even harder
en_quotes.author: Tia Mowry

en_quotes.quote: Only true love can fuel the hard work that awaits you
en_quotes.author: Tom Freston

en_quotes.quote: The end of labor is to gain leisure
en_quotes.author: Aristotle

en_quotes.quote: We win more business, not because of pitching but because clients say, 'We like the work you're doing.'
en_quotes.author: David Droga

en_quotes.quote: Sweat, sweat, sweat! Work and sweat, cry and sweat, pray and sweat!
en_quotes.author: Zora Neale Hurston

en_quotes.quote: If you work hard and play by the rules, this country is truly open to you. You can achieve anything
en_quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

en_quotes.quote: Let there be work, bread, water and salt for all
en_quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

en_quotes.quote: My suggestion is that we should first work to ensure the Third World has clean drinking water and sanitation
en_quotes.author: Bjorn Lomborg

en_quotes.quote: Big jobs usually go to the men who prove their ability to outgrow small ones
en_quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

en_quotes.quote: The supreme accomplishment is to blur the line between work and play
en_quotes.author: Arnold J. Toynbee

en_quotes.quote: Work while you work, play while you play - this is a basic rule of repressive self-discipline
en_quotes.author: Theodor W. Adorno

en_quotes.quote: Intelligence is the ability to avoid doing work, yet getting the work done
en_quotes.author: Linus Torvalds

en_quotes.quote: God has a plan for all of us, but He expects us to do our share of the work
en_quotes.author: Minnie Pearl

en_quotes.quote: Sometimes you just have to calm down a little bit and let the system work itself
en_quotes.author: Blake Griffin

en_quotes.quote: Obviously, a long-distance relationship is hard. But, like anything worth having, you make it work
en_quotes.author: Leona Lewis

en_quotes.quote: I'm just a player who wants to work and who does my job every day, the same as I always did
en_quotes.author: Xherdan Shaqiri

en_quotes.quote: Executive ability is deciding quickly and getting somebody else to do the work
en_quotes.author: Earl Nightingale

en_quotes.quote: I just hate losing and that gives you an extra determination to work harder
en_quotes.author: Wayne Rooney

en_quotes.quote: A person who has not done one half his day's work by ten o clock, runs a chance of leaving the other half undone
en_quotes.author: Emily Bronte

en_quotes.quote: Formula for success: rise early, work hard, strike oil
en_quotes.author: J. Paul Getty

en_quotes.quote: If you must have motivation, think of your paycheck on Friday
en_quotes.author: Noel Coward

en_quotes.quote: I never did anything by accident, nor did any of my inventions come by accident; they came by work
en_quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

en_quotes.quote: Let the beauty of what you love be what you do
en_quotes.author: Rumi

en_quotes.quote: I never diet. I smoke. I drink now and then. I never work out
en_quotes.author: Naomi Campbell

en_quotes.quote: When love and skill work together, expect a masterpiece
en_quotes.author: John Ruskin

en_quotes.quote: Now at 47, 48 I am expected to do ten times better work that I did when I was 24
en_quotes.author: Salman Khan

en_quotes.quote: Work is a necessary evil to be avoided
en_quotes.author: Mark Twain

en_quotes.quote: We're human. Enjoy yourself. You work hard every day; you deserve to turn up on the weekends with your friends
en_quotes.author: Logic

en_quotes.quote: Education is a work of self-organization by which man adapts himself to the conditions of life
en_quotes.author: Maria Montessori

en_quotes.quote: I work best inundated with things, when it's like raining information
en_quotes.author: Ryan Seacrest

en_quotes.quote: Do not hire a man who does your work for money, but him who does it for love of it
en_quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

en_quotes.quote: There's no escalators - there's only staircases to success. There is no substitute for hard work
en_quotes.author: Lilly Singh

en_quotes.quote: If you've got the confidence and the work ethic, you can make any dream come true
en_quotes.author: Bret Hart

en_quotes.quote: My work is like my vacation, so in a way every day is like Saturday
en_quotes.author: Ludacris

en_quotes.quote: Work gives you meaning and purpose and life is empty without it
en_quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

en_quotes.quote: Results! Why, man, I have gotten a lot of results. I know several thousand things that won't work
en_quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

en_quotes.quote: Unemployment is capitalism's way of getting you to plant a garden
en_quotes.author: Orson Scott Card

en_quotes.quote: To pay attention, this is our endless and proper work
en_quotes.author: Mary Oliver

en_quotes.quote: I work 90 hours a week. I work 5 to 9, it's not 9 to 5
en_quotes.author: Angie Harmon

en_quotes.quote: They talk of the dignity of work. The dignity is in leisure
en_quotes.author: Herman Melville

en_quotes.quote: We treat our people like royalty. If you honor and serve the people who work for you, they will honor and serve you
en_quotes.author: Mary Kay Ash

en_quotes.quote: Know yourself; keep your circle tight. Keep your friends and your work circle tight
en_quotes.author: Rita Ora

en_quotes.quote: Reality is easy. It's deception that's the hard work
en_quotes.author: Lauryn Hill

en_quotes.quote: The average American worker has fifty interruptions a day, of which seventy percent have nothing to do with work
en_quotes.author: W. Edwards Deming

en_quotes.quote: Honor lies in honest toil
en_quotes.author: Grover Cleveland

en_quotes.quote: We should judge by talent and work not by community or caste
en_quotes.author: Nana Patekar

en_quotes.quote: Nobody's a natural. You work hard to get good and then work to get better. It's hard to stay on top
en_quotes.author: Paul Coffey

en_quotes.quote: Bottom line is, work ethic equals dreams, and I am walking proof that that's a fact
en_quotes.author: Diamond Dallas Page

en_quotes.quote: The brain sure as hell doesn't work by somebody programming in rules
en_quotes.author: Geoffrey Hinton

en_quotes.quote: A writer wants something more than money for his work: he wants permanence
en_quotes.author: A. A. Milne

en_quotes.quote: I'd like to dial it back 5% or 10% and try to have a vacation that's not just e-mail with a view
en_quotes.author: Elon Musk

en_quotes.quote: I've tried to give a dollar and 25 cents in work for every dollar paid me
en_quotes.author: Casey Stengel

en_quotes.quote: Work is a necessity for man. Man invented the alarm clock
en_quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

en_quotes.quote: Know that even when you want to give up or throw in the towel, in the end it will all be worth the hard work
en_quotes.author: Ashton Eaton

en_quotes.quote: Work isn't to make money; you work to justify life
en_quotes.author: Marc Chagall

en_quotes.quote: All that work you put in, it's so worth it to win a medal
en_quotes.author: Mo Farah

en_quotes.quote: If you don't want to work you have to work to earn enough money so that you won't have to work
en_quotes.author: Ogden Nash

en_quotes.quote: O man you are busy working for the world, and the world is busy trying to turn you out
en_quotes.author: Abu Bakr

en_quotes.quote: When you set the right targets, aspirations, and you work efficiently and diligently, the numbers happen
en_quotes.author: Anand Mahindra

en_quotes.quote: Good things happen to those who hustle
en_quotes.author: Chuck Noll

en_quotes.quote: Watch every detail that affects the accuracy of your work
en_quotes.author: Arthur C. Nielsen

en_quotes.quote: Everyone has complicated lives, but the more you can simplify it and make it work for you, the better it is going to be
en_quotes.author: Lewis Hamilton

en_quotes.quote: There is joy in work. There is no happiness except in the realization that we have accomplished something
en_quotes.author: Henry Ford

en_quotes.quote: The little dissatisfaction which every artist feels at the completion of a work forms the germ of a new work
en_quotes.author: Berthold Auerbach

en_quotes.quote: There are one hundred men seeking security to one able man who is willing to risk his fortune
en_quotes.author: J. Paul Getty

en_quotes.quote: When more and more people are thrown out of work, unemployment results
en_quotes.author: Calvin Coolidge

en_quotes.quote: Ya gots to work with what you gots to work with
en_quotes.author: Stevie Wonder

en_quotes.quote: I'm fascinated by musicians who don't completely understand their territory; that's when you do your best work
en_quotes.author: Brian Eno

en_quotes.quote: I take work very seriously and telling the truth in my job and professionalism
en_quotes.author: Brittany Murphy

en_quotes.quote: I like elegance. I like art nouveau; a stretched line or curve. These things are very much in the foreground of my work
en_quotes.author: H. R. Giger

en_quotes.quote: Working hard and working smart sometimes can be two different things
en_quotes.author: Byron Dorgan

en_quotes.quote: Work will win when wishy washy wishing won t
en_quotes.author: Thomas S. Monson

en_quotes.quote: The harder I work, the luckier I get
en_quotes.author: Samuel Goldwyn

en_quotes.quote: Anyone who can walk to the welfare office can walk to work
en_quotes.author: Al Capp

en_quotes.quote: Management is nothing more than motivating other people
en_quotes.author: Lee Iacocca

en_quotes.quote: Be regular and orderly in your life, so that you may be violent and original in your work
en_quotes.author: Gustave Flaubert

en_quotes.quote: Nothing is work unless you'd rather be doing something else
en_quotes.author: George Halas

en_quotes.quote: Work is much more fun than fun
en_quotes.author: Noel Coward

en_quotes.quote: He who seeks rest finds boredom. He who seeks work finds rest
en_quotes.author: Dylan Thomas

en_quotes.quote: The only time some people work like a horse is when the boss rides them
en_quotes.author: Gabriel Heatter

en_quotes.quote: You only do good work when you're taking risks and pushing yourself
en_quotes.author: Sally Hawkins

en_quotes.quote: In the end it's about the work, not an award you get for the work
en_quotes.author: Linda Fiorentino

en_quotes.quote: I have offended God and mankind because my work didn't reach the quality it should have
en_quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

en_quotes.quote: I have been up against tough competition all my life. I wouldn't know how to get along without it
en_quotes.author: Walt Disney

en_quotes.quote: My experience has been that work is almost the best way to pull oneself out of the depths
en_quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

en_quotes.quote: Everyone has been made for some particular work, and the desire for that work has been put in every heart
en_quotes.author: Rumi

en_quotes.quote: I guess I feel the most powerful when someone tries to take my power or belittle me or insult me, and it doesn't work
en_quotes.author: Stormy Daniels

en_quotes.quote: Critique, feedback, reaction to one's work or the way they have presented it, regardless of intention, is a gift
en_quotes.author: Mark Brand

en_quotes.quote: The only way to enjoy anything in this life is to earn it first
en_quotes.author: Ginger Rogers

en_quotes.quote: It's what I learn from the great actors that I work with. Stillness. That's all and that's the hardest thing
en_quotes.author: Morgan Freeman

en_quotes.quote: Work is the curse of the drinking classes
en_quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

en_quotes.quote: Some things is made by destiny, yes, other things by hard work, but quality you don't learn. Quality you are born with
en_quotes.author: Zlatan Ibrahimovic

en_quotes.quote: In action a great heart is the chief qualification. In work, a great head
en_quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

en_quotes.quote: Gentleness doesn't get work done unless you happen to be a hen laying eggs
en_quotes.author: Coco Chanel

en_quotes.quote: Most of the energy of political work is devoted to correcting the effects of mismanagement of government
en_quotes.author: Milton Friedman

en_quotes.quote: It is your work in life that is the ultimate seduction
en_quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

en_quotes.quote: My work is a self-portrait of my mind, a prism of my convictions
en_quotes.author: Fernando Botero

en_quotes.quote: I want to work with Jay-Z
en_quotes.author: Robert Wilson

en_quotes.quote: I have to work, for my soul
en_quotes.author: Jennifer Lopez

en_quotes.quote: I love fishing and surfing, and I work out every day
en_quotes.author: Karl Urban

en_quotes.quote: To be a poet is a condition, not a profession
en_quotes.author: Robert Frost

en_quotes.quote: If I went to work in a factory the first thing I'd do is join a union
en_quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

en_quotes.quote: Without work, all life goes rotten. But when work is soulless, life stifles and dies
en_quotes.author: Albert Camus

en_quotes.quote: Nobody ever drowned in his own sweat
en_quotes.author: Ann Landers

en_quotes.quote: I think the person who takes a job in order to live - that is to say, for the money - has turned himself into a slave
en_quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

en_quotes.quote: The pay is good and I can walk to work
en_quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

en_quotes.quote: I never did a day's work in my life. It was all fun
en_quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

en_quotes.quote: Work is not man's punishment. It is his reward and his strength and his pleasure
en_quotes.author: George Sand

en_quotes.quote: Hard work always pays off, whatever you do
en_quotes.author: Dustin Lynch

en_quotes.quote: No, I didn't work it out upside down, I never turned it around
en_quotes.author: H. R. Giger

en_quotes.quote: A manager is responsible for the application and performance of knowledge
en_quotes.author: Peter Drucker

en_quotes.quote: Work is accomplished by those employees who have not yet reached their level of incompetence
en_quotes.author: Laurence J. Peter

en_quotes.quote: We have a system that increasingly taxes work and subsidizes nonwork
en_quotes.author: Milton Friedman

en_quotes.quote: Find a job you like and you add five days to every week
en_quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

en_quotes.quote: Careers, like rockets, don't always take off on time. The trick is to always keep the engine running
en_quotes.author: Gary Sinise

en_quotes.quote: When your work speaks for itself, don't interrupt
en_quotes.author: Henry J. Kaiser

en_quotes.quote: Labor gives birth to ideas
en_quotes.author: Jim Rohn

en_quotes.quote: Don't stay in bed, unless you can make money in bed
en_quotes.author: George Burns

en_quotes.quote: The more I want to get something done, the less I call it work
en_quotes.author: Richard Bach

en_quotes.quote: Inspiration comes of working every day
en_quotes.author: Charles Baudelaire

en_quotes.quote: Give yourself something to work toward - constantly
en_quotes.author: Mary Kay Ash

en_quotes.quote: Economics is extremely useful as a form of employment for economists
en_quotes.author: John Kenneth Galbraith

en_quotes.quote: Big pay and little responsibility are circumstances seldom found together
en_quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

en_quotes.quote: The idea of having a steady job is appealing
en_quotes.author: Robin Williams

en_quotes.quote: Working hard is very important. You're not going to get anywhere without working extremely hard
en_quotes.author: George Lucas

en_quotes.quote: The harder you work... and visualize something, the luckier you get
en_quotes.author: Seal

en_quotes.quote: There's something to be said in favor of working in isolation in the real world
en_quotes.author: A. R. Ammons

en_quotes.quote: We work to become, not to acquire
en_quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

en_quotes.quote: I work 338 days a year, 16 hours a day
en_quotes.author: Dave Pelzer

en_quotes.quote: I've got a woman's ability to stick to a job and get on with it when everyone else walks off and leaves it
en_quotes.author: Margaret Thatcher

en_quotes.quote: My husband changed jobs so fast that I simply never knew what business he was in
en_quotes.author: Rose Kennedy

en_quotes.quote: Blessed is he who has found his work; let him ask no other blessedness
en_quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

en_quotes.quote: Every noble work is at first impossible
en_quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

en_quotes.quote: Work alone is noble
en_quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

en_quotes.quote: It is only when I am doing my work that I feel truly alive
en_quotes.author: Federico Fellini

en_quotes.quote: If you put all your strength and faith and vigor into a job and try to do the best you can, the money will come
en_quotes.author: Lawrence Welk

en_quotes.quote: I have found in work that you only get back what you put into it, but it does come back gift-wrapped
en_quotes.author: Joyce Brothers

en_quotes.quote: I always got my work done before playing
en_quotes.author: Edwin Moses

en_quotes.quote: No one can arrive from being talented alone, work transforms talent into genius
en_quotes.author: Anna Pavlova

en_quotes.quote: It's easier to change what you do than people think it is. If you don't change, your field changes around you
en_quotes.author: Walter Gilbert

en_quotes.quote: I work to stay alive
en_quotes.author: Bette Davis

en_quotes.quote: The greatest teacher I know is the job itself
en_quotes.author: James Cash Penney

en_quotes.quote: I think about my work every minute of the day
en_quotes.author: Jeff Koons

en_quotes.quote: Teaching was the hardest work I had ever done, and it remains the hardest work I have done to date
en_quotes.author: Ann Richards

en_quotes.quote: Concentrate on your job and you will forget your other troubles
en_quotes.author: William Feather

en_quotes.quote: One thing I never want to be accused of is not working
en_quotes.author: Don Shula

en_quotes.quote: No fine work can be done without concentration and self-sacrifice and toil and doubt
en_quotes.author: Max Beerbohm

en_quotes.quote: Most people treat the office manual the way they treat a software manual. They never look at it
en_quotes.author: James Levine

en_quotes.quote: I'm working myself to death
en_quotes.author: Alan Ladd

en_quotes.quote: You're blessed if you have the strength to work
en_quotes.author: Mahalia Jackson

en_quotes.quote: I can't imagine anything more worthwhile than doing what I most love. And they pay me for it
en_quotes.author: Edgar Winter

en_quotes.quote: If Botticelli were alive today he'd be working for Vogue
en_quotes.author: Peter Ustinov

en_quotes.quote: Work expands so as to fill the time available for its completion
en_quotes.author: C. Northcote Parkinson

en_quotes.quote: Work, look for peace and calm in work: you will find it nowhere else
en_quotes.author: Dmitri Mendeleev

en_quotes.quote: Men for the sake of getting a living forget to live
en_quotes.author: Margaret Fuller

en_quotes.quote: Put off thy cares with thy clothes; so shall thy rest strengthen thy labor, and so thy labor sweeten thy rest
en_quotes.author: Francis Quarles

en_quotes.quote: One man's wage increase is another man's price increase
en_quotes.author: Harold Wilson

en_quotes.quote: Honest labor bears a lovely face
en_quotes.author: Thomas Dekker

en_quotes.quote: The will to work of everyone in the country is the best guarantee of national survival
en_quotes.author: Bhumibol Adulyadej

en_quotes.quote: Work is a prayer. And I start off every morning dedicating it to our Creator
en_quotes.author: Joseph Murray

en_quotes.quote: Management must manage!
en_quotes.author: Harold S. Geneen

en_quotes.quote: Managers in all too many American companies do not achieve the desired results because nobody makes them do it
en_quotes.author: Harold S. Geneen

en_quotes.quote: There is no disgrace in working. There was no silver spoon around at the time I was born
en_quotes.author: Anna Held

en_quotes.quote: After two weeks of working on a project, you know whether it will work or not
en_quotes.author: Bill Budge

en_quotes.quote: Be open to the amazing changes which are occurring in the field that interest you
en_quotes.author: Leigh Steinberg

en_quotes.quote: As I understand it, sport is hard work for which you do not get paid
en_quotes.author: Irvin S. Cobb

en_quotes.quote: Every man loves what he is good at
en_quotes.author: Thomas Shadwell

en_quotes.quote: I met an American woman and got married so I had to get a job
en_quotes.author: Walter Wager
